mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_address ( uid, name, province, city, area, district, zip, address, phone, tel, tag, is_default, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUE ( #{uid}, #{name}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{district}, #{zip}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{tel}, #{tag}, #{isDefault}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_address SET is_default=0 WHERE uid=#{uid}
UPDATE t_address SET is_default=1 WHERE aid=#{aid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(aid) FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid}
SELECT aid, name, district, address, phone, tag, is_default AS isDefault FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY is_default DESC, modified_time DESC
SELECT uid, is_default AS isDefault FROM t_address WHERE aid=#{aid}
SELECT aid FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY modified_time DESC, aid DESC LIMIT 0,1
